website_summaries.verdict: These 4 chairs bring instant delight to a dull backyard in need of a pick me up.
pros: As complicated as the design may appear, these chairs are much easier to put together and get the conversation going
The perfect touch for a whimsical, outdoor dining space in a small setting
You'll be surprised how comfortable this set is as well
cons: Seldom a bad review, you may find the packaging is a bit bruised however the product is overall, quite sturdy

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish chairs
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for chairs that were better scaled for a small dining space. I was skeptical that these would be comfortable but surprisingly they are quite comfortable given the curved shape of the seat. These shipped quickly and were easy to put together. Very happy with this purchase! Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. VanTyne

customer_reviews.title: and are sturdy as hell
customer_reviews.text: These are shockingly comfy. They were packaged VERY badly, however, and the metal had a few tiny breaths of rust on it. Still, they went together well and don't scratch the floor, and are sturdy as hell. My husbear and I are not small men, and they haven't made any alarming noises or buckled at all. This is on top of how gorgeous they are. Very Hannibal-esque, and in fact the husbear picked them based on another Fannibal reviewer (who has since disappeared?). They make our black kitchen look that much more gothic, like a modern Addams vibe. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE ❤️ THESE CHAIRS !!!! And who said they are not stackable? Well, hers the proof
customer_reviews.author: David and Lilit Conelly

customer_reviews.title: Just 5 stars ✨
customer_reviews.text: My choice was black...im in love .....I have 2 years old so. and it's good with kids too ....
customer_reviews.author: Sashka

customer_reviews.title: Unique, sturdy, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These were surprisingly comfortable! Sturdy, and great as accent chairs. I have a tropical/ modern themed space that had plants and lots of green color and these chairs fit right in as accents to the dining room. Also, the pattern gave me goosebumps, in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: ShopaholicCarma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, stack easily
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly comfy! Unboxing and assembly only took 15 min. Perfect size, stack easily, and look a lot more expensive than they are.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool chairs- inexpensive yet comfy. Very easy to assemble. Didn't take but about 5 min each
customer_reviews.author: lunamond

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these chairs! I expected them to be much smaller but they are so roomy and very comfortable! In fact, I purchased some pads for them which ended up being too small because they are quite wide! Also they scoop down so it really makes them feel very sturdy. Extremely happy I got these! I'm planning on getting another set for my patio in another color! They look modern yet not overly modern. My mom thinks they have a butterfly look to them. I Love them! Not to mention the price is amazing for the look and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl L Wade

customer_reviews.title: Most beautiful plastic chairs I've ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs! Look great and are actually comfortable since they are curved. Bought these for Thanksgving since they stack and can be put away when I don't have guests over. Love how they are a shiny bright white. Very modern!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design for price
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite furniture purchases on Amazon! They look expensive, are comfortable (+I'm a larger sized person) and yet they are economically priced. They look worth four times more :) super easy to assemble too.
customer_reviews.author: Earandsea

customer_reviews.title: Modern & Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chairs. I was the debating between these plastic chairs or leather dining chairs because I have kids and I need something that Easley wipes. I’m so glad I went with these chairs. They are super comfortable and tucked in nicely to the table and also have a slight bend to it when leaving back.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I AM IN LOVE WITH THESE CHAIRS. I ordered these for an office breakroom to give it a little more of a modern and fun aesthetic. These did exactly the trick. The black color makes them look so elegant and they appear exactly as shown in the images. The height is perfect - we have them underneath a free hanging counter top work space. The assembly was super simple and the chairs are very sturdy and shockingly incredibly comfortable. All of the staff complimented how cute and comfortable they were. There's enough space to easily sit with a pillow as well. I'd definitely order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly, Quick Delivery - Awesome Chairs for a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the set of two black chairs. I received them within two days of order. Super quick delivery! The box package was delivered in a good condition and the manufacturer wrapped the chairs well enough where there was no wear and tear on the actual chairs. They came brand new. Assembly took me less than 10 minutes to put both chairs together by myself. It is not necessary to hire someone to help set them up. All you need to do is put in the screws that come with the package. I will ordering the set of 4 white chairs! I really love how they look in my home. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: khadeejah

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up. Amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that I purchased these chairs. I live in an apartment so I don't have much room for large furniture but these chairs are the perfect size for my dining area. They are extremely sturdy, easy to put together and they look beautiful! I can't wait until my table arrives so that I can see just how great it looks with these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: These chairs look as good or even better than the pictures on Amazon. Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chairs to go with a table on my deck. We had the metal base of the table powder-coated shiny black to go with the chairs. It turned out exactly as i'd hoped. The table top is glass so you can see these wonderful chairs through the top, the chairs are very comfortable and give when you lean back. It took me over a week to decide to buy them because I thought they cannot possibly be that good looking. Happy buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Medwadowski

customer_reviews.title: Modern/Unique. Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are so modern looking. They are lightweight and comfortable to sit in. I plan to use them with a small table on my outdoor porch and I see using them for occasions when needing extra seating. Also, they are beyond easy to assemble. There is the plastic chair, the lightweight leg component and 4 screw sets. The allen wrench is provided as well and even though the description says 15 minutes, I swear it took less than 5 minutes to put one together.
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: They break
customer_reviews.text: Metal welded legs broke after a few months. The screws attaching the legs to the plastic seat kept unscrewing and falling off. Had 20 of these the past year. About half broke apart
customer_reviews.author: primababe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chairs
customer_reviews.text: These chairs although plastic are comfortable to sit in. The unique design is attractive to look at. We're using one in a spare bedroom and the other in our office. Nice decent thickness to the white plastic. I can report that one of the tabs had to be bent a little as it initially would not mate with the hole to screw it in.
customer_reviews.author: PoppaDon

customer_reviews.title: end result is BEAUTIFUL.
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was quite DIFFICULT ; end result is BEAUTIFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Duchess_Ash

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfortable, sturdy chairs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these chairs to use as occasional chairs in my small apartment and they're perfect. They're sturdy, assembly took about 5 minutes per chair (I bought 2) and very comfortable. The design is elegant yet casual, which sounds odd, but it's true. I use them for dining as well as seating and they work great for both uses and they look pretty in my combo living room/dining room. I'm very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan from Tampa Bay

customer_reviews.title: Great Modern Chairs!!!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the chairs in black to go with a round chrome glass top dinning table. They look amazing!!! Like others we wish we could get an extra two chairs so we could sit 6 but so far the chairs are only offered in sets of 4. The chairs are very shiny and comfortable. You can lean back in the chair...think of a bounce but not a full on rocking. You can also add a small flat cushion if that is required for a guest. Assembly was very easy and quick to put together. The vendors packaging was amazing and arrived as promised. Once again thanks to Amazon for offering such a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anita S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy modern kitchen seating
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly the fresh, clean modern but interesting look that I was going for. The seats are wider than some I’ve seen, which is great for those of us who aren’t skinny or lightweight. They are also super comfortable. I bought these to use as part of a bistro seating nook in my kitchen and they work perfectly. I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: TSP

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and modern.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together, had all 4 assembled in less than 30 minutes. Pretty comfortable and have a little bounce in them so you can rock a little. Just a little uncomfortable on the backs of your legs if you have shorter shorts on and sit for a long time. Got these for my spa since they are easy to clean and disinfect. Every single client has complimented them and a few have asked for the link to buy them. Oh, and they said 3 weeks on delivery but I had them in 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: AmazinMom4

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for small chairs to put in front from a fireplace that is in my kitchen. I also wanted something that I could put outside (though no leave outside). These chairs are perfect. I especially loved the "Spider web" design.
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, i don’t like that the back gives when you sit. For someone who might be heavy it doesn’t seem like it would hold up as far as the leaning back part. The base is strong. I use these in my salon they are perfect for that and i get a lot of complements on them.
customer_reviews.author: Easy peezy

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together. It took me less than a half hour to assemble 2 of them. They are so comfortable! They are sleek and good looking and seem like they will last a long, long time. I would certainly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Terese

customer_reviews.title: Edgy and cool. Great price for the quality!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone comments on how awesome these look. They instantly improved the whole vibe of our dining room. I love that they lightened our room because you can see through them. They seem like decent quality for the price and are more comfortable than one would think! I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and sturdy.  Prompt delivery, too!
customer_reviews.text: These look great, are super comfortable, and seem like they will support a lot of weight and be durable. Only complaint is the tabs that the screws went through weren't angled that well to meet with the holes in the seat, but it pulled together ok when assembled, so not even taking a star for that. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: A.E.

customer_reviews.title: For the Office Patio - Employees love them
customer_reviews.text: I am the Building Supplies purchaser at my work. I purchase these chairs in black and white for our employee's Lounge. One set is for the Patio and the other set for the Kitchen area. These chairs replaced our older (4 year old IKEA) chairs. By far these chairs are comfortable upon sitting. Natural curve gives a comfortable experience. CONCLUSION: They are attractive and will continue to buy these chairs as we need replacements.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMarisol

customer_reviews.title: Great modern look at a great value
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with these chairs. Used them for my new sitting room and they are stunning. Love the modern look, they were easy to assemble and are lightweight but VERY sturdy (I'm somewhat of a big tall and girl and so are my friends and we were all very comfortable. Received them in quick great timing. Would definitely recommend for anyone who loves a modern look for a great value.
customer_reviews.author: lover of reading

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable chairs, that look great !
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of four for my office and I love them so much I bought another set of four. They do not look comfortable, but everyone who sits on them comments on how comfortable they are. Extremely easy to put together. I have two in my office and six in our waiting room. Love love love these chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Katsaras

customer_reviews.title: Far sturdier than expected
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are really cool, and we plan on ordering a couple more in the future. When we received the box, however, one of the sets of hardware was missing, so that’s been a huge pain in the butt, trying to find screws at the hardware store that fit. But, the chairs themselves are really sturdy, comfortable, and modern.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very durable chairs that were easy to put together. Cons: Not very comfortable as I thought. If you’re wearing shorts, you could get imprinted by the chair. The seller took two weeks to finally send my package to FedEx after having the label created. It came later than expected and I had already waited two weeks with no shipping activity. Overall, the chairs are okay.
customer_reviews.author: M & M

customer_reviews.title: have a seat, yes please!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived late, but well packaged. Seller was very helpful when shipping delay occurred. Chairs were easy to assemble and look fabulous, they're also quite comfortable. I would not hesitate to purchase from this seller, and these chairs are great!
customer_reviews.author: dessert diva

customer_reviews.title: NO ASSEMBLY DIRECTIONS PROVIDED
customer_reviews.text: There are no assembly directions provided, just some useless drawing with no words. I've searched all over the web for some help and found none. Do not purchase unless you are an experienced and skilled at figuring out assembly
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble, durable, and look cool!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are sturdy and comfortable. By comfortable, I mean that the chairs are wide enough and deep enough that they allow for a good roomy seating area. They also look cool and are stackable if necessary. They were very easy to assemble; just screw on the leg parts. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy

customer_reviews.title: So Unique!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these chairs! I positioned them at a small table by the kitchen bay window. Somehow the design in the chairs reflects all the oak trees outside. These re unlike anything else I've seen and I'm proud to show them off!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these chairs!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so so happy I bought these chairs. They are so stylish, durable & so comfy. I also like how well packed they were. The chairs were so easy to put together. Now I want to replace all my dining room chairs w/ these. Buy these! You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: Rusted on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Rusted out metal they are so beautiful otherwise I’m so mad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking chairs and not that bad to sit on
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking chairs and not that bad to sit on. My wife was looking for something different for the living room table. She came across these and fell in love with them. Great price and great product
customer_reviews.author: Nestor Cruz

customer_reviews.title: More than ehat i expected
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. Really pretty. Steady. I would give it more stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: RF.Economics

customer_reviews.title: Stylish dining chairs
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these chairs! What I didn't love was moving the giant shipping box upstairs to my apartment. But oh well. Assembly was easy enough, and the chairs are quite comfortable. I just received them yesterday, but they seem durable.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Selinko

customer_reviews.title: Modern and affordable (Update after one year and moved)
customer_reviews.text: These are a very cute and modern looking set in my apartment. Comfortable to sit on and stylish! The packaging looked beaten up and I was afraid the parts may have damage but I found it alright. Great for the price! Update: Still like new and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: fitE

customer_reviews.title: Have to tighten monthly
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, easy assembly, very comfortable. The only negative is the screw/bolts have to be tightened monthly so plan on leaving the little Allen wrench handy and marking it on your calendar cause if you don’t they fall out!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Needed black chairs to go with a black bistro table. A pair of these fit the bill. Comfy and easy to assemble, also easy to wipe down (with two boys in the house that’s a huge plus).
customer_reviews.author: HollyRN

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, durable, and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Love them! I ordered these for my kids new computer desk. They are 5 & 7 so wanted something durable and easy to clean. The chairs are very sturdy, the plastic is flexible, durable and easy to wipe clean. Took less than 10 mins to unwrap it and put it together; Didn’t even need the instructions. They fit perfectly under their 55” desk with room to spare! They also look great so can pull them out to the living room for extra seating if needed! Arrived a day early too :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and sturdy but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: once you sit and then get up all the design of the chair will be marked on your skin. not comfortable at all to sit on. nice design though and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing I didn't like. It was very easy to put together and I'm no spring chicken. Black makes casual look elegant. They are very good value for the price. My friend and I are very very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: lightweight, easy to assemble. looks unpretentious in our home i didn't really think about how it would imprint on the back of my legs while i was purchasing.... but that's a thing to consider
customer_reviews.author: Max Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Little over priced .. decent chairs
customer_reviews.text: Decently made chairs not the best quality pretty over priced if you ask me but gets the job done. I would go with a more high end brad from wayfair or something for a few extra bucks. Manufacturers should lower the price. Gets the job done tho.
customer_reviews.author: Koosman09

customer_reviews.title: Do it do it do it
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed!!! I’ve gotten so many compliments on these already. They are surprisingly comfortable, which was a necessity for these being in my basement which is where we conduct game nights. No one wants to sit on an uncomfortable seat for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Chairs are so cute and look great with my kitchen table
customer_reviews.text: Chairs are so cute and look great with my kitchen table. Very easy to put together. It took longer to receive the chairs than it should have. The box was badly damaged with hardly in packing material. Chairs were not damaged and I really love them..
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gable

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Liked the look and sturdiness of the chair but all the 4 chairs were wobbly. will not recommend on a wooden floor. Returned..
customer_reviews.author: pravin

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, well made, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are amazing and super easy to clean/wipe down (even spaghetti sauce, which btw, didn’t stain them). The shape helps keep wiggly toddlers from falling off since they’re slightly curved inwards on the edges. They are very light weight and easy to move around when it comes to sweeping/mopping. I’m very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: wwp2181

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chairs!! I will have to agree with other buyers that a few are not perfectly level and rock a bit, but it isnt bad. The seats are high quality and sturdy - not to mention comfortable!! I was a tad concerned about sitting in them for long periods of time but they are surprisingly comfortable. They were a perfect purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W.

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than they look
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chairs for the waiting area of my private practice. I gave them 4/5 stars for easy to assemble because they're a little tricky to place together (e.g. the metal bracket isn't labeled front or back but once you figure that out it's easy. They're cool chairs which give my waiting area a unique look. Might be buying some for my dining room at home...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updated! Surprisingly sturdy and stackable and _comfortable_!
customer_reviews.text: Update: About a year of use and they still look great! Original: Comfortable chairs that are taller than plain folding chairs. Nicer looking too! I love that they can stack! We've used them for a month and everyone likes them. I've even received compliments about them.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne L.

customer_reviews.title: Classroom Addition
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chairs to use in a comfy spot in my classroom. I do have to remind my 9th grades to not lean back in the chairs...for some reason they like to rock...but the kids enjoy hanging out in them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Funky
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are beautiful. They match my decor perfectly. I redid my bathroom and these chairs are the perfect accent. They are comfortable and give a little while sitting on them. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sandstorm

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, look amazing
customer_reviews.text: Really pleasantly surprised by these. Seriously easy to put together. Sturdy, which was a concern since my hubby and I are bigger. They look amazing in my dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sleek, light, and really cool!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I bought these chairs for our new apartment dining room. We didn't have to break the bank, and they look so sleek! Also takes about 3 minutes to assemble each one, and they're really light to carry. We've only had them for about a month, so we'll see how long they last. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: uscgypsy

customer_reviews.title: Chairs seem nice
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to assemble. They also seem sturdy. The back has a little give, which is nice. We just bought them so I have no information on how they will stand up to the test of time, but there is nothing negative that immediately jumps out at me.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay Singal

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sophisticated.
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my office. They're comfortable and easy to clean. They're very stylish, too.
customer_reviews.author: robin677

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the cutout design and how easy they were to assemble. My husband is a pretty stout dude and they hold up well to 260 lb daily use. Pretty comfortable too. The backs have some give, so they aren't too rigid like a normal dining chair. Absolutely stunning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Designer Chairs for a Low Price!
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I expected, comfortable, & the back has some give to it. Very sturdy plastic body, beautiful design. Such a light, airy look- exactly what I wanted to replace old heavy wooden dining chairs. Took me 5 min to put each chair together. Take the black plugs out that are underneath the seat. Put the metal frame on, put in the screws as directed, but don't tighten until all the screws are in. Honestly, they're worth double the price, the quality is great. And easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Delsie Birks

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Functional, and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered a set of four of these chairs to use as extra seating in my dining room. The box arrived a bit damaged, but the chairs inside were fine. They were easy to assemble and very sturdy yet lightweight and easy to move. They look great and are very easy to store since they stack. I've since ordered another set of two. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Love then more than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: It has an open airy feel to it, which makes a small place not feel so tight. I like the whimsical feel to it too, as it goes with my coastal decor. The box came broken and beat up, so I was worried about the contents, but the legs were wrapped perfectly and no damage to product! Putting them together was extremely simple! Hint in the directions to not tighten down screws until all screws are secure would help, since it allows for movement to center the holes. After that initial struggle, it was cake!
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Modern and practical
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my office. I love how they look! Easy to assemble. Pretty comfortable, though I haven’t sat in them for extended periods of time. The backs feel a little flimsy but after months of pretty heavy use, not one has cracked or broken. They are stackable but I would be afraid that stacking them would scratch the glossy black finish. All in all I think they are pretty great!
customer_reviews.author: LaurenBurgess

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: The chairs arrived on time, in good condition, and with all of the pieces required to put them together. Assembly was so easy, I was able to put the chairs together while chatting on the phone. They look great in my dining space.
customer_reviews.author: Nillabean1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and modern
customer_reviews.text: Love my chairs, they help pull the modern into my modern farmhouse decor to my house. Love that they are stackable, so I can move it around easily. I was a little worried that they would be uncomfortable with all the holes, but glad to report it doesn't bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Danelle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I actually thought these would be less comfortable but I was pleasantly surprised at how comfortable they actually are. They are super pretty and sturdy as well!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: You must try these chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly lightweight yet sturdy, comfortable and attractive. We planned on purchasing only 2 chairs but may have to order 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Diana S.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: The chairs arrived very quickly and were a cinch to assemble. They are comfy and stylish. I was hoping they were more on the matte side, but that's okay. Quite a steal for 4 stylish chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Valentine

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These are modern and chic and look great in any room. im so happy to have these! and they are really comfortable too! the cut out design reminds of tree branches and and for me it was a touch of the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: EPH320

customer_reviews.title: Well made chairs!!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished putting these chairs together which was extremely easy to do. They supplied all the tools needed to assemble these beautiful chairs. They arrived very quickly and they are packaged with such care to protect the item. They are absolutely beautiful, unique, well made chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Modern Style for Indoor/Outdoor Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase with UrbanMod and the product design is a perfect fit for indoor and outdoor entertaining. The product was easy to assemble and my 12 yr old did it! Excellent quality. I appreciated the handle and care with packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good chairs great look!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! They look good were easy to assemble and are sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Burson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs were both beautiful and comfortable. They took only about 5 minutes to assemble and look great in my office. I have recently been promoted to an administrator position at my school, so this is the first time in 20 years I had to furnish an office instead of a classroom. I am so glad I chose them and can't wait for the students to come by and see these beautiful new chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lemmon

customer_reviews.title: Modern, stacking chairs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a modern chair that would hold up. These are adorable and stack, which is fantastic for moving and cleaning! Everyone who has sat in them has been comfortable and enjoyed the pattern. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TaylorB

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Them Again!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable chairs, I love that they have a shiny smooth surface and they stack. A good value too.
customer_reviews.author: Vedafaye

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are great! They are exactly what you’d imagine getting. I actually saw them at a nail salon before I purchased them, and loved them. They stack nicely too. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Just the best!! So comfortable, sturdy, and stylish! Stack super easily, and other reviews were right about how well it was packaged when shipped, and also ease of assembly. Would absolutely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Willis

customer_reviews.title: modern,functiona,l comfortable and very strong
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are very deceiving! My husband sits on these chairs very comfortably and he is very muscular and stocky. It also states that the chairs hold someone of up to 300lbs and I am really impressed the chairs are very very strong leaving us very impressed. we have received many compliments as well.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna G.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, easy to put together and STUNNING in person.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and modern, put together in under 5 minutes, easy to clean and look stunning. What else is there to say! Got to go with a brushed gold and clear glass top table and they look stunning.
customer_reviews.author: girl2012

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: sturdy and comfortable as well (and my daughter forgave me for accidentally ordering the black instead of the white 😳)
customer_reviews.author: Joann Lett

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chairs. Very sturdy, better than expected ! Love them !!
customer_reviews.author: Emu K.

customer_reviews.title: Wow, great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: So contemporary and comfortable!! Easy to assemble and I love the chrome finish on the legs. Great price for the pair!
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stunning.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best chairs. We have them on our patio and they are gorgeous and VERY comfortable. Lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Weiss

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are it!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these chairs. I’m using them for indoor dining. They are modern and fit with my minimalist look. They can stack, super easy to put together and the best part, MY KIDS CAN’T RUIN THEM. I bought 6 chairs total, so if you’re contemplating just do it you won’t find a better bang for your buck
customer_reviews.author: Angel & John

customer_reviews.title: The chairs were VERY easy to assemble and are a lot more comfortable than ...
customer_reviews.text: The chairs were VERY easy to assemble and are a lot more comfortable than they look!! I am quite satisfied with my purchase. Once my table is decorated, im sure the chairs will look even better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: These are great chairs. I have pets and children, so needed durable chairs. They are awesome, and easy to clean. Paired with a glass table. Super easy to put together. If I can do it anyone can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable basic chairs
customer_reviews.text: These are great budget chairs. I use one for a desk and it stays comfortable for a couple of hours, longer if you take breaks to get up a d stretch from time to time
customer_reviews.author: LittlePinkFlowers

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Love them ❤️
customer_reviews.text: We love our chairs! We first purchased a set of two of them in white. They’re so comfortable we decided to get four in black for our casual dining area. We got them in no time at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great looks, but uneven
customer_reviews.text: As the title says. Could have easily tested legs before or after assembly. They were never even, and it has a slight rock because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Thought these chairs might be to funky or uncomfortable. Not the case at all, simple to assemble 5-10 minutes no tools necessary; they supply an allen wrench. The chairs are lightweight but sturdy and very comfortable. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great patio table chairs
customer_reviews.text: Higher quality and comfort than expected. Very easy to assemble. I spray painted legs with anti-rust black and they are outdoor patio chairs. Very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these modern chairs❤️
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are such a good deal! They are so easy to assemble and are high quality. They elevated our dining room a lot and look super modern. I would recommend these 100%!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaKStrader

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are super cute and easy to clean. I use them outside and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of places selling similar-looking chairs and I couldn't decide which to choose. I'm glad we went with the UrbanMod chairs. They were packed perfectly, received with no damage, they were very easy to assemble (the holes perfectly lined up with the screws.) They are sturdy and look great. So if you're looking for "birch" modern chairs, you found the best ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry F.

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs arrived well packed and are exactly as described! They were sent super fast and were exactly what we were looking for! The dimensions were accurate and helped us make the decision to buy the chairs. Best part, they look great and are more comfortable than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Looking for Assistance

product_meta.title: UrbanMod Black Modern Dining Chair | (Set of 4) Stackable Birch Sapling Accent Armless Side Chairs
feature_bullets: ✅MODERN, ELEGANT & CLASSY. From the dining room to the patio, this set of 4 Birds Nest Chairs (AKA Birch Chair) accents any home décor. Enjoy the peaceful feeling of Mother Nature every time you walk into a room.
✅STACKABLE & PRACTICAL. These tree chairs are 100% stackable and light for easy transport and storage. They feature high grade stainless steel legs, chrome finished with black floor protectors.
✅EXTENDED GUARANTEE. We stand firmly behind our manufacturing team. So we’ve gone beyond the Amazon 30-Day Guarantee. Our gift to you is 2 YEARS replacement on all parts. No questions asked.

✅EASY TO ASSEMBLE & CLEAN. All tools required are included, and assembly takes a maximum of 15minutes. Enjoy a glass of red wine around these stunning white gloss chairs, spills are easily wiped away.

✅FESTIVE AND FANCY! The Sapling Chair is simply stunning at the Christmas table. And as a white modern chair, it automatically matches the season, without the need for chair covers. Order your set today.
